Title: For a new user created with mobile only, the mobile number should be verified on Verify Now button click.
Expected Result: For a new user created with mobile only, the mobile number should be verified on Verify Now button click.
Preconditions: User should be created with a mobile number only
Section Hierarchy: Account Management > User Identity > Verification
Steps:
1. Click on side nav > My balance > Verify Now 
2. The mobile number is seen as verified.

Title: For a user that gets created with email address should be able to verify mobile no after login is successful.
Expected Result: For a user that gets created with email address should be able to verify mobile no after login is successful.
Preconditions: 1. Registration should be done using google / facebook account.
Section Hierarchy: Account Management > User Identity > Verification
Steps:
1. On registering user with Google/Facebook, the user gets created with email address but not mobile no.
2. On successful login, the verify mobile no popup should be received.
3. Mobile no should be verified when on OTP verification.

Title: When the email new user is created with mobile only flow, the email should allowed to verify from Verification screen
Expected Result: When the email new user is created with mobile only flow, the email should allowed to verify from Verification screen
Preconditions: 1. Login with registered mobile no and email is not verified.
Section Hierarchy: Account Management > User Identity > Verification
Steps:
1. Click on Side Nav > My Balance > Verify Now > Enter email screen > Add email > Enter OTP received on email.
2. Once OTP verification is done, the email get verified.

Title: For a user registered with Google / Facebook, its email should be verified in Verify Account page.
Expected Result: For a user registered with Google / Facebook, its email should be verified in Verify Account page.
Preconditions: The user should be registered with Google and/or Facebook
Section Hierarchy: Account Management > User Identity > Verification
Steps:
1. Login with google or Facebook user
2. Click on Side Nav > My Balance > Verify Now.
3. The email should be seen as verified.

Title: Organic PAN verification
Expected Result: If the PAN is verified, the status should be shown as Verified for PAN in Verification screen
Preconditions: 1. Verify Now button should be seen to user on My Balance page
Section Hierarchy: Account Management > User Identity > Verification
Steps:
1. Upload PAN no,name,PAN Card photo from Verify PAN screen.
2. The PAN should get verified once all the conditions are met.
3. The status should be seen as Verified in verification once PAN is verified.

Title: Modify PAN Verification Data - Before approval
Expected Result: 1. Modifying option of pan details should be available if the pan verification is rejected.
Preconditions: PAN verification should be pending.
Section Hierarchy: Account Management > User Identity > Verification
Steps:
1. Click on verify Now for PAN.
2. If the PAN is rejected, modify the PAN no, name and upload appropriate PAN card photo.
3. Submit the details.

Title: PAN no should be masked on PAN verification screen as well as Verify account screen.
Expected Result: PAN no should be masked on PAN verification screen as well as Verify account screen.
Preconditions: 1. PAN should be verified.
Section Hierarchy: Account Management > User Identity > Verification
Steps:
1. Open Verify Account page , PAN no should be masked.
2. Open Verify PAN details, PAN no should be masked.

Title: Verify once after PAN details are Verified/ In review, Rejected same should be reflected in My Balance- KYC Details
Expected Result: Verify once after PAN details are Verified/ In review, Rejected same should be reflected in My Balance- KYC Details
Preconditions: The PAN details should either be Verified / Rejected or In-Review.
Section Hierarchy: Account Management > User Identity > Verification
Steps:
1. Click on Side Nav > My Balance > MY KYC details page.
2. The status of the PAN verification should be seen on this page.

Title: Verify once after bank details get verified, same should be reflected in MY balance - KYC details
Expected Result: Verify once after bank details get verified, same should be reflected in MY balance - KYC details
Preconditions: The bank should be verified.
Section Hierarchy: Account Management > User Identity > Verification
Steps:
1. Click on side nav > My balance > My KYC page
2. If the bank is verified, the same should be seen in My KYC page.

Title: Organic Bank Verification
Expected Result: Once the valid bank details are uploaded, the bank should get verified.
Preconditions:
1. Verify Now button should be seen to user
2. bank details of user should not belong to santo state.
Section Hierarchy: Account Management > User Identity > Verification
Steps:
1. Click on side nav > My balance > Verify Now 
2. Update account no, ifsc code, upload bank details page.
3. Click on submit

Title: Validate Existing Bank Details Check
Expected Result: Existing bank details check should be present for user.
Preconditions: Bank details should be added in one account
Section Hierarchy: Account Management > User Identity > Verification
Steps:
1. Click on verify now from My balance page.
2. Upload details of the same bank already added in another account.
3. An error message should be seen.

Title: Verify Unlink bank account option when Bank is Verified
Expected Result: 1. Unlink bank account should be present in KYC page for a verified bank account. Also, on unlinking the bank, Verify now button should be seen on My balance page.
Preconditions: Bank should be verified for a user.
Section Hierarchy: Account Management > User Identity > Verification
Steps:
1. Click on side nav > My Balance > KYC page
2. Click on bank > Unlink bank button should be present.
3. On clicking unlink bank, the bank should get removed from the account and verify now button should be seen on My Balance page.

Title: If the bank details are added for verification, the status should be shown as in-review
Expected Result: If the bank details are added for verification, the status should be shown as in-review
Preconditions: Verify now button should be seen to the user.
Section Hierarchy: Account Management > User Identity > Verification
Steps:
1. Click on Verify Now > Upload bank details to be verified.
2. Click on upload.
3. The verification status for the bank is in-review.

Title: If the bank is rejected, the status should be seen in Verification page.
Expected Result: If the bank is rejected, the status should be seen in Verification page.
Preconditions: 1. Upload incorrect bank details for the user.
Section Hierarchy: Account Management > User Identity > Verification
Steps:
1. The details uploaded should get rejected with appropriate reason.
2. The status shown on verification page should be rejected.

Title: Validate UPI section is shown on verification
Expected Result: UPI section should be shown on verification page
Preconditions: Email, bank or pan should be unverified
Section Hierarchy: Account Management > User Identity > Verification
Steps:
- Click on Side Nav --> My Balance 
- Click on Verify to Withdraw/Verify Now button
- Check UPI section

Title: Verify verification list page for UPI In Review state
Expected Result: When UPI is submitted state should be displayed as In Review
Preconditions: Execute TC C292059
Section Hierarchy: Account Management > User Identity > Verification
Steps:
- Click on add UPI
- Enter valid UPI add and submit
- Check the status of UPI on verify account page

Title: Verify verification list page for UPI rejected state
Expected Result: UPI status should be displayed as Rejected
Preconditions: Execute TC C292062
Section Hierarchy: Account Management > User Identity > Verification
Steps:
- Click on Add new UPI
- Enter invalid UPI
- Click on Submit 
- Check the status of UPI after sometime

Title: Verify verification list page for UPI Success state
Expected Result: UPI status should be displayed as Verified
Preconditions: Execute TC C292060
Section Hierarchy: Account Management > User Identity > Verification
Steps: - Check the UPI status after sometime

Title: Verify in case of failure user should be able to update UPI
Expected Result: User should be able to update/resubmit the rejected UPI again
Preconditions: Execute TC C292062
Section Hierarchy: Account Management > User Identity > Verification
Steps:
- Click on rejected UPI
- Enter/update the UPI ID
- Click on Submit

Title: Verify in case of successful UPI verification, user should not be able to update UPI
Expected Result: Bottom-sheet should not be display to update the UPI when its already verified
Preconditions: Execute TC C292063
Section Hierarchy: Account Management > User Identity > Verification
Steps: - Click on UPI to update

Title: Verify UPI section is shown in KYC details
Expected Result: All the added UPIs should be displayed on KYC Details page
Section Hierarchy: Account Management > User Identity > Verification
Steps:
- Click on KYC Details from My Balance page
- Check the verified, Failed, In Review UPI'S

Title: Verify KYC list page for multiple UPI's
Expected Result: All the added UPIs should be displayed under Your UPIs section on KYC details page
Preconditions: Execute TC C292062 for adding multiple UPI IDs
Section Hierarchy: Account Management > User Identity > Verification
Steps:
- Click on KYC details section from My Balance page
- Check multiple UPI added

Title: Verify on KYC list page on tap of verified UPI, unlink UPI bottom sheet is shown
Expected Result: Unlink UPI bottom-sheet should be shown on tap of verified UPI
Preconditions: Execute TC C292063
Section Hierarchy: Account Management > User Identity > Verification
Steps:
- Click on KYC details from My Balance page
- Go to UPI section
- Click on Verified UPI

Title: Verify tap of unlink on unlink bottom sheet, user taken back to KYC list page with success/failure toast msg
Expected Result: User should be redirected back to KYC list page
Preconditions: Execute TC C292069
Section Hierarchy: Account Management > User Identity > Verification
Steps: - Click on Unlink button

Title: Verify on tap of failed UPI, add UPI bottom sheet is shown with msg
Expected Result:
- ""UPI Verification rejected. Tap to retry."" message should be displayed below rejected UPI
- Add UPI bottom-sheet should be shown on tap of failed UPI with msg - 'This UPI ID does not exist or is no longer in use. Please try again' or 'This UPI ID already exists. Please try again with another ID'
Preconditions: Execute TC C292062
Section Hierarchy: Account Management > User Identity > Verification
Steps:
- Click on KYC Details from My Balance 
- Click on Failed/Rejected UPI

Title: Verify once user performs action on failed UPI then failed/rejected tag is removed for that UPI
Expected Result:
- UPI status should get updated after resubmitting the UPI
- In Review status should be shown for submitted UPI
Preconditions: Execute TC C292071
Section Hierarchy: Account Management > User Identity > Verification
Steps: Update/add the UPI and submit the details

Title: Verify user is able to submit UPI or Bank for verification when PAN is in review
Expected Result: User should be able to submit UPI or Bank for verification when PAN is in review
Preconditions: PAN should be in In-Review state
Section Hierarchy: Account Management > User Identity > Verification
Steps:
- Click on Add UPI
- Enter UPI and submit
- Click on Add bank account
- Enter the bank details and submit

Title: Verify user is able to submit UPI or Bank for verification when PAN is verified
Expected Result: User should be able to add UPI and bank account after PAN is verified
Preconditions: Execute TC C136403
Section Hierarchy: Account Management > User Identity > Verification
Steps:
- Add UPI and submit
- Enter bank details and submit

Title: Verify user is not able to submit UPI or Bank for verification when PAN is in rejected state
Expected Result: UPI and Bank account option should be disable
Preconditions: PAN is not verified for the user
Section Hierarchy: Account Management > User Identity > Verification
Steps: - Click on Add UPI or Add bank account

Title: Verify when PAN state changed from in review to verified, UPI and Bank is picked for verification
Expected Result:
- After all the checks for PAN are passed then PAN is verified
- UPI and Bank should be picked for verification
Preconditions:
User has submitted PAN for review
UPI and Bank is also added for review state
Section Hierarchy: Account Management > User Identity > Verification

- UPI should get added with In review state

- Click on submit

- Click on X icon

Following details should be shown on Add UPI bottom-sheet:
- Note: This process may take a while and please make sure the name in this ID is same as on your PAN

Expected Result: On clicking My Info and Settings following details should be present for newly created user - Name, Mobile, Country

Title: Team name should contain alphabets and space only. Numbers and other special characters should not be allowed.
Expected Result: Team name should contain alphabets and space only. Numbers and other special characters should not be allowed.

Section Hierarchy: Account Management > User Identity > My Info and Settings
Steps: 1. Type numbers or special characters apart from space, there should be an error message stating ""Please remove numbers or special characters from name"".

Title: Minimum characters limit for name is 3 in My info and Settings.
Expected Result: Minimum characters limit for name is 3 in My info and Settings.

Title: On clicking cancel icon, all the typed characters for name should get cleared.
